text: Rivers of Babylon is a 1998 Slovak Czech comedy movie directed by Vlado Balco and was based on the 1991 novel of the same name by Peter Pišťanek. It stars Andrej Hryc, Vladimír Hajdu, Diana Mórová, Barbora Kodetová, Miro Noga. ==Other websites== * Category:1998 comedy movies Category:Slovakian movies Category:Czech comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Rivers of Babylon (movie)
